EmailTemplate.name: TS-2016-02-25 Toronto VMUG Cocktail Party.EMAIL-Cocktail Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Toronto VMUG Cocktail Hour
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, VMTurbo is hosting a happy hour following the Toronto VMUG at Baton Rouge, 277 Front St. West <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/B%C3%A2ton+Rouge+Steakhouse+%26+Bar+-+Toronto+Front+Street/@43.6438544,-79.4584012,12z/data=!4m15!1m12!4m11!1m3!2m2!1d-79.38905!2d43.6489473!1m6!1m2!1s0x882b34d6ddf42fdf:0xeeedcf738d2c4a4!2s277+Front+St+W,+Toronto,+ON+M5V+2X4,+Canada!2m2!1d-79.3883614!2d43.6438758!3m1!1s0x882b34d6ddf42fdf:0xeeedcf738d2c4a4]]>. Make sure to stop by Booth #7 at the VMUG to pick up your ticket for cocktails and appetizers, on us, from 5:00PM â€“ 7:00PM on 2/25/16.
See you there! <[[http://www.drakesf.com/]]>- The VMTurbo Team
